				"cf_reject_explanation": "1. The supported link can be found by using command \"ethtool ethx\", or refer to the following link\r\nhttps://companypress.company.com/lp1310-broadcom-57454-10gbaset-ethernet-adapters\r\n\r\n\r\n4. 				"cf_reproduce_steps": "1.restart bmc:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -H 10.240.203.138 -U USERID -P bmc reset cold\r\n2.boot to os:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -U USERID -P  -H 10.240.203.138 power off\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -U USERID -P  -H 10.240.203.138 power on\r\n3.check backup or primary\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -U USERID -P  -H 10.240.203.138  raw 0x3a 0x4e\r\n4.check fru print:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -N 8 -H 10.240.203.138 -U USERID -P FW2020bbfv fru print\r\n5.check mc info:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -N 8 -H 10.240.203.138 -U USERID -P mc info\r\n6.check sol info:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -N 8 -H 10.240.203.138 -U USERID -P sol info\r\n7.send cli command vpd uefi\r\n8.send cli command  check vpd bmc\r\n9.send cli command vpd fw\r\n10.send cli command vpd fw\r\n11.inband check dmidecode\r\n12.check redfish server ready\r\n13.vpd version check:\r\nsend cli command vpd sys\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -H 10.240.203.138 -U USERID -P  fru list 0\r\n14._ipmi sdr check:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -U USERID -P  -H 10.240.203.138 sdr\r\n15.ipmi check core dump:\r\nipmitool -I lanplus -C 17 -U USERID -P  -H 10.240.203.138 raw 0x3a 0x4d 0x09 0x00",
